channel.title: philstar.com - RSS Headlines
channel.description: Philippine News for the Filipino Global Community

item.title: JBC opens application for seat of Justice Carandang who will retire in January 2022
item.author: Kristine Joy Patag
item.description: The Judicial and Bar Council has opened the application and recommendation period for the post to be vacated by Supreme Court Associate Justice Rosmari Carandang, who will retire early next year.

item.title: Philippines gets 3 million more Sinovac, 2 million Pfizer doses
item.description: This latest shipment brought the country's Sinovac doses to 36 million, making it still the largest number of vaccine supply in the country.

item.title: ‘Billions paid to Pharmally could feed 1.6 million families’
item.author: Paolo Romero
item.description: The P12 billion paid by the government to Pharmally Pharmaceutical Corp. to deliver COVID-19 supplies could have fed at least 1.6 million poor Filipinos or could have obviated the need to secure loans from China to fund a dam project, Sen. Richard Gordon said.

item.title: Workers with COVID-19 may apply for cash aid – ECC
item.author: Sheila Crisostomo
item.description: Employees who get infected with COVID-19 may now apply for cash assistance with the Employees Compensation Commission without going to its office.

item.title: US ‘clear-eyed’ on Chinese efforts to undermine international order
item.author: Pia Lee-Brago
item.description: The United States intends to remain “clear-eyed” in viewing China’s efforts to coerce and intimidate countries in the Indo-Pacific region, US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin said in a recent meeting with Australian officials in Washington.

item.title: Concepcion eyes shorter quarantine for fully vaxxed North America travelers
item.author: Louella Desiderio
item.description: Presidential adviser for entrepreneurship Joey Concepcion is pushing for a shorter quarantine period for fully vaccinated travelers from North America to encourage them to celebrate Christmas with their family and relatives in the Philippines.

item.title: LPA to dump rains over Philippines
item.author: Elizabeth Marcelo
item.description: A low-pressure area spotted off Romblon will dump rains over most parts of the country today, the state weather bureau said.

item.title: 171 Metro Manila areas under granular lockdown
item.author: Neil Jayson Servallos
item.description: Over 100 areas in Metro Manila are under granular lockdown after the government started imposing the new COVID-19 alert level system in the region, the Department of the Interior and Local Government said yesterday.

item.title: Jollibee extends 10% discount for vaccinated diners
item.author: Iris Gonzales
item.description: Jollibee Foods Corp., a listed Asian food conglomerate, is extending its 10-percent discount offer for dine-in transactions of vaccinated individuals until Nov. 30 this year.

item.title: DOH: 10,000 doses wasted due to temperature excursion
item.author: Sheila Crisostomo
item.description: Some 10,000 doses of COVID-19 vaccines have been wasted primarily due to “temperature excursion,” the Department of Health said yesterday.
